page.title: 20LANGHOLM_BY AN OLD PERSON
page.content: {LONG AGO}WE PLAYED HOPSCOTCH OR SKIPPING.WE HAD TO HELP OUR MUMS TO WASH THE CLOTHES(NO WASHING MACHINES), MAKE BEDS(NO CONTINENTAL QUILTS) AND SWEEP THE FLOOR (LINOLEUM).WE STARTED AT THE LITTLE {SCHOOL},WHICH IS NOW THE COMMUNITY CENTRE,WHEN WE WERE 5.AT 7 WE CAME UP TO THE{'BIG SCHOOL',} UNTIL WE WERE 14.WE PRACTISED OUR LETTERS ON {SLATES }AND WROTE WITH PENS DIPPED IN INK.WE HAD TO RESPECT OUR TEACHER OR WE GOT{THE BELT.}WE HAD TO GO TO {CHURCH}EVERY SUNDAY.THE {POLICEMEN}RODE ON BIKES.WE ALSO HAD A CINEMA THEN.LANGHOLM IS A GOOD PLACE FOR {OLD PEOPLE}TO LIVE BECAUSE THERE ARE LOTS OF THINGS FOR THEM TO DO.
